item.title: Markets mixed as traders weigh trade deal, US inflation data
item.author: AFP Englischsprachiger Basisdienst
item.description: Asian markets were mixed Wednesday as they weighed Indonesia's trade deal with Washington and a spike in US inflation that saw investors pare their bets on Federal Reserve interest rate cuts. Donald Trump said a trade deal had been struck with Jakarta that will see Washington impose tariffs of 19 pe...

item.title: Hong Kong stocks lifted by Nvidia rally on mixed day in Asia
item.author: AFP Englischsprachiger Basisdienst
item.description: Tech firms led another rally in Hong Kong stocks Wednesday after US titan Nvidia said it would resume exports of key chips to China after Washington pledged to remove licensing curbs. However, other Asian markets were mixed as they weighed Indonesia's trade deal with Washington and a spike in US inf...
